meanings.definition: In a dejected or discouraged manner
meanings.sent1: After losing the game, he walked crestfallenly off the field.
meanings.sent2: She sighed crestfallenly when she saw her test score.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked crestfallenly at the empty food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The flowers drooped crestfallenly in the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The student slouched crestfallenly in his chair after failing the exam.
